info.name: #Raw Materials Collections
info.description:
This is material collection. Here user can create new material, modify the material, get all material and also can change the status.

This is all of my methods of the endpoint. 
1. GET get_all data return from the database.
2. POST new data and save data from UI to database
3. PUT is used for modifying user data from UI

request.description: This is Api endpoint for Get All the Material info in the system. This is GET method for using load data from database and show to UI

response.name: material/get_all

request.description: This is Api endpoint for Create New Material in the system.
This is Api endpoint for Modify Material in the system.
This is Api endpoint for set the status in the system.

This is Api endpoint for Get All Populated the Material info in the system, here you can add diameter, length, weight, thickness, and set what is the type of diameter or length, e.g: diameter(mm) or (cm) added with a side of diameter type.

response.name: material/get_all/populated
